籤詩版本二:
Qin Jun amapirira moyo wodzisunga ndipo watsimikiza kuti asachite zoipa.
Mpaka wina agwiritse ntchito mphamvu mofatsa, nthambi zakufa ndi mitengo yakale idzapanganso maluwa.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ili ngati maluwa omera mitengo yakufa.
Chilichonse chili ndi kupambana kwake.
解曰: Khalani osamala komanso odekha. Zinthu zimachitikadi. Ngati zisuntha, padzakhala masoka ambiri. Palibe mlandu kukhala chete.
籤詩故事一:
◇Usodzi wa Weishui
Mu Mzera wa Zhou, Jiang Shang, wotchedwa Ziya, anabadwira ku Ji (mbadwa ya Xuzhou, East China Sea), ndipo dzina lake la Chitao linali Fei Xiong. Makolowo anapatsidwa dzina la Zai Lu (dzina la malo), choncho amatchedwanso Lu Wang.
Pofuna kuthawa nthawi zovuta za Mfumu Zhou ya mzera wa Shang, Jiang Ziya ankakhala m'mphepete mwa nyanja ya East China Sea ndipo ankapha nsomba mumtsinje wa Weishui.
Nsombayo ndi yowongoka, zoona zake n’zakuti mtima wake suwedza, koma cholinga chake ndi kukhala nduna yaikulu.
Mfumu Wen inamva kuti inali yanzeru ndipo inamulemba ntchito monga mphunzitsi wake (nduna yaikulu). (Jiang Ziya anali ndi zaka makumi asanu ndi atatu panthawiyo)
Pambuyo pake, Mfumu Wu ya Zhou inaukira Mfumu Zhou ya Shang, inawononga Mzera wa Shang, ndikukhazikitsa Mzera wa Zhou. King Wu adatcha Jiang Ziya Shangfu. Mwana wa Feng Jiang, Ding Gong, adakhala Marquis wa Qi.
(Nkhani iyi ndi fanizo: dikirani mwayi, dikirani mpaka patakhala mwayi woyambitsa, ndiye chitukuko chidzayamba.)
聖意: Zabwino zonse kwa banja, nyumba, ndi chuma, ikadzakwana, malondawo ayenda bwino.Ngati mtsikana wabadwa ku Liujia, oyenda pansi amatsekereza minda, mphutsi za silika zimatsekeka.Ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi zimakhala zovuta kuzipeza.Zabwino. mwayi pamilandu, kusamuka, kusakonda, kutayika kwa katundu, matenda, ndi madalitso, zabwino zonse m'mapiri ndi manda.
第X籤: Lotale yopambana makumi anayi ndi zisanu ndi chimodzi
